item.title: Minio as Eucalyptus Object Storage
item.description: Minio, the new cloud storage written in Go that let’s you store any data as objects also has another great feature, it’s AWS S3 compatible and that makes Minio really useful with Eucalyptus. Eucalyptus supports multiple ObjectStorage backends, Riak CS (Cloud Storage), Ceph RGW and Eucalyptus already comes with S3 compatible Walrus. Eucalyptus ObjectStorage service acts as a gateway for the backends. Eucalyptus still handles all the AWS compatible Identity and Access Management stuffs.
